step2.description: Back here and press Accept Invitation or enter the invitation code on the Settings/My Account page.

items.title: Journaling is healing, Shanshan is amazing!
items.content: After using it for a few days, I feel great and have become a member. Some of the conflicting negative thoughts just seem to dissipate once I write them down; it's different from just recording audio. Overall, Shanshan is really nice!

items.title: Ready to use right away, a great assistant for creativity!
items.content: I'm a student from opera department and usually need to record many improvised movements. This real-time recording feature will definitely be very convenient for me!

items.title: User-friendly, excellent experience!
items.content: I am a teacher and often need to record classroom discussions. This tool allows me to quickly capture students' insights, with a clean interface and simple operation, making it perfect for my needs!
